name: MLB Slugfest 20-04
overview: MLB SlugFest 20-04 is the first and only aggressive-style baseball videogame franchise, delivering a proprietary blend of hardcore, lightning-fast, adrenaline-style gameplay combined with key baseball features that will please even the most diehard sports fan. Game features include turbo running, fielding, batting and throwing; new Create-A-Team allows gamers to create their own own All-Star;new customizable instant replay; new Home Run Derby; new pitching 'On Fire'; new authentic batting stances and pitching motions; new expanded and updated rosters, schedules, uniforms and stadiums; and new fantasy stadiums, characters and music, featuring Hoobastank's hit song, "Crawling in the Dark".
